    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Theory and Methods of English Studies &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">

     </span>

     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16976212">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976212">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976212">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976212">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976212" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976660">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976660">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976660">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976660">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976660" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976674">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976674">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976674">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           If I want to publish my class project on the web, where can I find images, etc. that I can use without asking for permission?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976674">
          <p>
           Consult Trexler Library's guide to
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/publicdomain">
            <em>
             Nonexclusively Licensed and Public Domain Images
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976674" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16976221">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976221">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976221">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for locating topics and getting recommendations of sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976221">
          <div id="boxatt16976221" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20019533">
              <a id="link_20019533" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019533,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription reference database including many well-known and respected reference works published ABC-CLIO, Routledge, and others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019546">
              <a id="link_20019546" href="http://www.galenet.com/servlet/LitIndex;jsessionid=AC4369B0A1F96E9B0E878DB9DEFE5AB5" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019546,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019546}); ">
               Gale Literary Index
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A master index to most of the literary biography sketchbooks listed below.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019552">
              <a id="link_20019552" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019552,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019559">
              <a id="link_20019559" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFP" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019559,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12457931}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Food and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A respected starting place for scholarly study of foodways.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019571">
              Oxford Companion to Food
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ref Collection 703 T948d
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019576">
              International Encyclopedia of Dance
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ref Collection
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019608">
              New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ref Collection 780.3 N532n
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019611">
              Dictionary of Art
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ref Collection 703 T948d
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976303">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976303">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976303">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary and secondary works as published in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976303">
          <div id="boxatt16976303" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20019644">
              <a id="link_20019644" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019644,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12615315}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976334">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976334">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976334">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary source materials from periodicals of the time
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976334">
          <div id="boxatt16976334" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20019653">
              <a id="link_20019653" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019653,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (late 1980s to present) Mostly magazines and scholarly journals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019660">
              <a id="link_20019660" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019660,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598770}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Mostly newspapers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019665">
              Reader's Guide to Periodical Literature (1900-present)
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reference Room Index Shelves, Level A, Trexler Library
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019669">
              <a id="link_20019669" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://history.paratext.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019669,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767757}); ">
               19th Century Masterfile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to Anglo-American nineteenth century newspapers, periodicals, books, and goverment documents
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976356">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976356">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976356">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Secondary research published as journal articles--often authoritative
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976356">
          <div id="boxatt16976356" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20019702">
              <a id="link_20019702" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019710">
              <a id="link_20019710" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019710,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378342}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (WilsonWeb) A subscription database. Includes extensive full text, from both popular and scholarly periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019801">
              <a id="link_20019801" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019801,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for art history, with indexing and abstracts from early 1900s-present. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20019908">
              <a id="link_20019908" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20019908,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for music scholarship: articles, books, and book chapters. Some links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976652">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976652">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976652">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Web search engines, directories, and selected site--especially good for primary sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976652">
          <div id="boxatt16976652" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20020022">
              <a id="link_20020022" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020022,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theory and Methods of English Studies', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4616814" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16976664">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976664">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976664">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976664">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976664" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976669">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976669">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976669">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976669">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976669" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976681">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976681">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976681">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Evaluating resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976681">
          <p>
           Visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//guides/evaluating.pdf">
            <em>
             Evaluating Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           page.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976681" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
